property.name: Text
property.value: When this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card. Awaken: When your life is at 4 or less: You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.

alternate.name: Rising Spirit Super Saiyan Son Goku

property.name: Text
property.value: During your turn, when your life is at 3 or less, this card gains +5000 power. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and if this card's power is 25000 or more, it gains Double Strike for the duration of the turn.

card.name: Broken Limits Super Saiyan 3 Son Goku

property.name: Text
property.value: EX-Evolve R, place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area: Red Son Goku: GT with an energy cost of 4 or more. Auto: When one of your cards attack, this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Then, if this card's power is 40000 or more, this card gains Triple Strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 1RR - Son Goku: GT. Barrier. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, or if you combo with this card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your red Leader Cards or Red Battle Cards. That card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Auto: When you combo with this card from the Battle Area, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve RR, Trunks: GT. Permanent: This card can attack Battle Cards that are in Active Mode. Auto: When yoou lay this card, choose up to 1 Battle Card from your hand with a power of 15000 or less and play it.
